review_data.title: Healthy Gluten-Free Soups in Zurich
review_data.content: A trendy cosy atmosphere which is great for a light lunch and drinks in Bellevue center. Excellent service and friendly staff and cool people.

review_data.title: Excellent spot for a rainy day
review_data.content: I got there by accident because it was raining so much on a cold friday of january. While I was ordering a chili con carne that turned out to be delicious, the place got buzzing with people in a joyous atmosphere. Overall a very pleasant...More

review_data.title: Great place to go right next to Bellevue in Zurich!
review_data.content: Outstanding location in Niederdorf, right next to Bellevue and the lake of Zurich. Warm and cozy atmosphere & the staff at LaZoupa is welcoming and very helpful. Great offering of wines and drinks in addition to the tasty soups and fresh coffee - I'd definitely...More

review_data.title: Soups and tea - perfect to warm up
review_data.content: I'm Russian and soups play a very important role in our eating culture. Therefore to find a place in Zurich offering a good choice of soups was a good luck for me. As I was a kid, my grandmother had often cooked soups in big...More

review_data.title: Great location!
review_data.content: Good soups nice personnel good opening times - the place's a treasure. Will be there regularly. Matt, the boss and all the personnel create a very nice and cosy atmosphere. The closeness to Bellevue and the lake is also adding to its qualities.

review_data.title: Value for money - disappointing
review_data.content: Went there for lunch - service is nice, and also the bistro itself. Menu choice looks good but then we realised all food (eat in and takeaway) is reheated, we were quite surprised. In general this might be a good choice for a place offering...More

review_data.title: Feine Säfte und Suppen
review_data.content: Angenehme Atmosphäre, freundliches Personal. Die Suppen, Säfte und Kuchen sind sehr fein, wenn auch nicht ganz billig.More

review_data.title: Cozy and welcoming

review_data.title: medium
review_data.content: well, lets start from the dishes... we take a soup, carrot soup and a salad (mozarella and tomatoes) ... the dishes were fine. the place had a smell, actually foodsmell, but i didn't like it! and the stuff was slow, there was no wifi too...

review_data.title: More than Soups
review_data.content: Nice place to get a quick soup or an Asian dish, Cous Cous or Chilli Con Carne. We had a Minestrone and a Pea Soup. Both very yummy. There are vegetarian, vegan and (for those with coeliac disease) also gluten free options on the menu.

review_data.title: Pleasant but not exceptional
review_data.content: I came across this small place while walking around Zurich on a Tuesday. It's on a pedestrian strip, so sitting outside on a warm September day was very nice. As their name suggests, they specialize in soups, especially Asian ones. I had a bowl of...More

review_data.title: Warm soup on a cold day
review_data.content: Visited this after a trip to Kunsthaus. It was raining a bit so the Lentil Curry Soup (16chf) hit the spot. My son ordered the pesto pasta (22chf, I think) which tasted fresh. Prices was average for Zurich. The seating was cute and friendly. There...More

review_data.title: Healthy food in the heart of Zurich
review_data.content: I was so pleasantly surprised to find this restaurant during my recent trip to Zurich. I really wanted to eat a warm, healthy soup... and there was La Zoupa. It's a really tiny place, but it has a few pretty chairs and tables outside and...More

review_data.title: Perfect place for a perfect evening
